text: Georgette Rejewski (12 February 1910 - 21 February 2014) was a Belgian-Dutch actress. She began her career in 1934. She appeared in the movies Any Day Now (1976), A Bridge Too Far (1977) and Another Mother (1996). She was born in Antwerp. Her father was Russian and her mother was Belgian. She married Dominique Antoine Frederic Rimathe in 1932. He died at the Bergen-Belsen concentration camp in 1945, at the end of World War II. Rejewski died from natural causes on 21 February 2014 at a nursing home in Middenbeemster, North Holland. She was aged 104. She had been living in the nursing home for the last years of her life. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1910 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Belgian movie actors Category:Belgian stage actors Category:Belgian television actors Category:Dutch centenarians Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Dutch stage actors Category:Dutch television actors Category:People from Antwerp
title: Georgette Rejewski
